title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Each criterion is achieved independently.

To meet the minimum requirement of “describe,” the response must do more than simply mention an isolated term. It is not necessary to offer a lengthy description, but the response must go beyond mere name-dropping by offering at least some relevant detail.
descriptions: Response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question. Responses that would have earned a point might include:
Response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
Response accomplishes any two of the tasks set by the question.
Response accomplishes all three of the tasks set by the question.
